summary: This code defines the `ShortMatchManager` interface, responsible for managing short-term memory. It can store up to 4 instances of `AIShortMatchModel`, adding a new model to the list and retrieving models by index or getting short-term cache sequences. The code also mentions deprecation status and clearing the manager.
